description: Goth boy Tony was looking forward to a romantic evening at their favorite cemetery, but Charlotte is tired of that. She wants to go to a club, and she always gets what she wants. The couple returns later with Lance, whom they met at the club and brought home to hang out. At least, that's what Tony naively believes. As soon as he leaves the room, Charlotte and Lance get to know each other better, starting with Charlotte licking and worshiping his boots. Tony comes in as Charlotte is sitting on Lance's face and he is none too pleased at this turn of events. But, Charlotte and Lance seem hellbent and soon invite Tony to join in and suck Lance's dick, which he reluctantly does. Then Charlotte takes over blowjob duties while Tony watches helplessly. This scene is part of the AVN-nominated DVD, "Kinky Cuckold 4." (Part 1 of 3)
title: Goth Cuckold (Part 1 of 3)
